title: Romaines
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A salad restaurant that allows customers to create their own salad as well as choose from salads on the menu. Uses locally sourced chickpeas, baked tofu, edamame, vegetables and nuts. All dressings are clearly labeled, including vegan and gluten free. Is a Certified Green Restaurant which sources local and organic produce whenever possible. Located in Grant Creek Town Center.
